title: Fudgy Brownies
subtitle: Moist, gooey, and quick.

instructions.text: Melt chocolate and butter over simmering water.
instructions.note: Avoid microwaving since butter melts faster than chocolate and can burn. A double boiler offers better control.

instructions.text: Whisk sugars into hot mixture gradually.
instructions.note: Some sugar crystals may remain but that's not a problem.

instructions.text: Whisk in eggs one at a time.
instructions.note: Your hands should hurt a bit! A bit more work that you might initially expect.

instructions.text: Sift salt, flour, cacao; fold into batter.
Line an 8x8-inch pan with greased baking sheet.
instructions.note: The butter paper is perfect for greasing.

instructions.text: Bake 35 min at 350°F; surface may look gooey.
instructions.note: I checked at 30 minutes, a fork came out clean but the top layer was just a little gooey. After 5 more minutes, it was still a tiny bit gooey but after cooling, it almost crystalized.

story: When you're having a chocolate craving, this decadent, moist brownie recipe is a quick fix! Hard to go wrong with this.
